author.@value: By Put on Your Cake Pants

ingredients.@value: 1/2 cup chocolate chips (plus extra for the top if desired)
1/3 cup butter or margarine (dairy-free is fine)

recipeInstructions.@value: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour the cups of a muffin pan or line with paper liners.				In the bowl of a mixer, cream together the butter and sugar. Add the egg and mix until incorporated. In a separate bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt. Add the dry ingredients to the mixing bowl. Stir in the remaining ingredients.				Portion the batter into the muffin pan, filling each cup no more than 3/4 full. Sprinkle extra chocolate chips on top, if desired.				Bake for 17 minutes, or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack.
